bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Adya is a universal open-source platform for commerce and supply chain. With its Platform-as-a-Service and integration-Platform-as-a-service capabilities, Siva is a truly interoperable solution, with more than 100 ready-made solutions at the door.

NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Processed by Cold Pressed Extraction Method retains natural Vitamin E and Vitamin D
ðŸ‘¶SKIN FRIENDLY: The massage oil is mild & Safe, suitable for all skin types.
HOW TO USE: Pour about a tea spoon on your palm and gently apply on skin or hair scalp. Massage thoroughly in a circular motion. However, remember, tummy massage should be done before feeding time.

descriptor.name: Crock Comforts - Handmade Couple Goal Dinner Set Ceramic Including Stoneware Dinner Plates(10 inch) with Serving Bowl and Coffee Mug(Set of 2, Microwave & Dishwasher Safe, CC- CGWM)
descriptor.long_desc:
LEAD-FREE AND NON-TOXIC - This bowl is lead free and non toxic ceramic that makes it safe for health. Never worry about harmful toxins leaching into your food. Safe to use around your family.
EASY TO CLEAN - They don't stain like many plastic bowls, plates or cups. This is dishwasher safe and easy to clean by hand if needed. They are safe for freezer, microwave, and oven as well.
Only Fleeter Comforts is authorise to sell genuine products under Crock Comforts Brand.
This is Studio Pottery there could be a slight variation in the dual tone glazing/color/finish on the product.
Package Content: 2 Full Plates(10 inch diameter), 2 Bowls and 2 Coffee mugs(330ml) Material: Ceramic/Stoneware

descriptor.name: The Moms Co. Everything for Baby with Suitcase Gift Box and 7 Skin and Hair Care New born Baby Gifts|Baby gift set for new born | Baby shower gift | New born baby gifts
descriptor.short_desc: HEAD-TO-TOE BABY NEEDS: For every mom who wants the best for her baby, our Baby Pampering Suitcase Gift Box is a one-stop solution! Ideal for new born baby gifts, it includes 7 Natural and Safe Baby Care Products for skin and hair.
descriptor.long_desc:
PACKED IN BABY'S FIRST SUITCASE: All products in this baby gift set for new born comes beautifully packed in a baby's first suitcase, ideal for gifting. We recommend re-using it to store your baby's first memories.
GENTLE, LIKE A MOTHERâ€™S TOUCH: The Moms Co. Range of Baby Skin Care products are all Clinically Tested to be Hypoallergenic, Mild, and Gentle for a baby's delicate skin.
NATURE IN. TOXINS OUT: THE MOMS CO. BABY PAMPERING SUITCASE GIFTBOX CONTAINS NO HARMFUL OR SYNTHETIC INGREDIENTS: Our Made Safe, Australia-certified toxin-free, Australia Allergy Certified, and Dermatologically Tested range of baby care products are made without Mineral Oil, Sulphates (SLS, SLES), Parabens, DEA/TEA, Phenoxyethanol, Synthetic Fragrances, PEGs, and many other potentially harmful chemicals.

descriptor.name: Bru Instant | Aromatic Coffee From South Indian Plantations | Premium Blend of Robusta & Arabica Beans For a Rich Coffee Experience | 200g
descriptor.short_desc: Real Taste of South Indian Coffee : Bru Instant is made with choicest coffee beans from South Indian plantations Select Beans : Bru Instant Coffee is crafted with the right blend of Robusta & Arabica coffee beans which are carefully handpicked from South Indian plantations.
descriptor.long_desc:
Fine Blend : Bru Instant is made with a blend of 70% Coffee & 30% Chicory
Great Aroma of Freshly Roasted Coffee Beans : Our unique roasting technology captures coffee aroma & ensures you have an aromatic experience with every cup of Bru Coffee
Instantly Made : Add one teaspoon of Bru Instant coffee powder in a cup along with hot milk and/or water, sugar to taste and your Bru coffee is ready to drink!
